dict.acceptation: 银制的；像银的；银色的；银白色的；
（在某物上）镀银；使具有银色光泽，使变成银色；

sent.orig: This article reviews the clinical diagnosis and advances on Silver-Russell syndrome.
sent.trans: 本文综述了Silver-Russell综合征的临床诊断标准及研究进展。

sent.orig: The forming of silver paper follows such process: solid-liquid-solid silver paper-given size silver paper.
sent.trans: 该方案中，锡箔成型的过程为：固态锡—液态锡—固态锡箔—一定尺寸规格的锡箔。

sent.orig: The body of the silver ink is Silver Aluminum powder, and silver oil support material.
sent.trans: 银墨的主体材料是银色的铝质粉末，它与调银油等辅助料调配而成。

sent.orig: The silver content in silver catalyst was determined by Volhard method.
sent.trans: 采用佛尔哈德法测银催化剂中银含量。

sent.orig: To extract gold silver from gold, silver containing ores by pressure cyanide leaching is studied.
sent.trans: 采用加压氰化浸出法研究了从含金银矿石中提取金银。
